intro: Sandoricum harmsianum, commonly known as the Caribbean starfruit tree, is a tropical plant native to the Caribbean and parts of Central America. It is a small to medium-sized evergreen tree that can grow up to 10 meters in height. The plant produces small, yellow, star-shaped fruits that are edible and have a sweet, tangy flavor. Its leaves are dark green,革质 (leathery), and arranged alternately along the stems. The tree is valued for its fruit and is also used in traditional medicine for its potential health benefits.
